data.text: Ngeche mag Solomon wuod Daudi, ruodh Israel:
mamiyo iyudo rieko kod ritruok makare,
kendo miyo idak e ngima moritore kendo mobidhore
gimiyo joma ngʼeyogi tin bedo mariek,
Mad jomariek chik itgi mondo owinji kendo gimedgi e puonjruokgi,
mondo gingʼe ngeche, sigendini,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye e chakruok mar ngʼeyo
Wuoda, chik iti ni puonj wuonu,
Ginibedni kaka kondo michwowo e wiyi,
Wuoda, ka joricho hoyoi mondo itim marach,
Kagiwachoni niya, “Bi idhi kodwa;
mondo wamuonygi ngili ka bur liel
wabiro yudo gik moko duto mabeyo ma nengogi tek,
In bende riwri kodwa e wachni,
Wuoda, kik idhi kodgi ngangʼ
nikech tiendgi reto piyo piyo mar timo richo
Mano kaka en gima nono chiko obadho
Jogi ochiko obadho ne gin giwegi,
Mano e giko jogo duto mohero yudo gimoro moyud e yo marach;
Rieko goyo koko matek e yore mag dala,
oywak kogoyo koko e akerkeke mag yore motimo koko,
“Nyaka karangʼo ma un joma ngʼeyogi tin nusik kuhero yoreu mag ngʼeyo matin?”
Ka dine uwinj siem mara,
To nikech ne udaga kane aluongo
nimar ne udagi puonj maga duto
An to ananyieru bangʼe ka un e chandruok;
ka masira machalo yamb ahiti obiro kuomu,
Giniluonga, to ok anadwokgi;
Kaka ne ok gidwar puonj
Kaka ne ok giyie gi puonjna
kuom mano ginicham olemo mag yoregi
Nikech yore mobam mag bayo mag jogo mangʼeyogi tin noneg-gi,
To ngʼato angʼata mawinjo wachna nodag gi kwe
